author: m.kalinin
content: could someone merge this PR manually: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7951 ?

author: mpaulucci
content: Hi, any reason why the EIPs don't have a reference to the fork where they were implemented? Is there anywhere I can find this info for every EIP?

author: samwilsn
content: EIPs (currently) don't track implementation status, and are somewhat fork (in the Ethereum Classic sense of the word) agnostic.
